channel.title: Client unable to Load Cache
channel.description: Hey there, I'm using TrisidiaX client and editing it to match my server. I changed some things in the Cache (Background of login page) and I had to change the place where it downloads the Cache from, which I have done. Before I go on, it DOES download the Cache! All of it! Anyway, after downloading, it quickly says Decompressing then changes to failed to load/download mindscape cache! It's ALL there! I don't know what's wrong here. Any help is most appreciated.

item.title: Client unable to Load Cache
item.dc:creator: @thomashawkins1991 thomashawkins1991
item.description:
@thomashawkins1991 wrote:

[quote=“jacksta21, post:7, topic:505857”][quote author=thomashawkins1991 link=topic=624086.msg4254427#msg4254427 date=1362506066]
for one you cache nothing but sprites? 2 you have cache.zip and on here failed to load/download mindscape cache… might wanna go back n fix all this.
[/quote]
facepalm I didn’t notice that… I understand step 1 and will fix, but I’m not sure what you mean by step 2? Please explain in more easy to read English?
Your help is most appreciated.

EDIT: Fixed, thanks a bunch for your help, sorry for my very stupid mistake lol :)[/quote]
(Please explain in more easy to read English?) i am talking in english!?
2 you have cache.zip and on here? (your download link aka cache.zip) failed to load/download ***mindscape cache***… might wanna go back n fix all this.

Read full topic

Well, I’ve changed it in signlink.java and client.java, I can’t find anywhere else that would point to the old cache directory, any suggestions of what file to look in?

post ur cache link.
[/quote]
http://mindscapepvp.com/downloads/cache.zip[/quote]
for one you cache nothing but sprites? 2 you have cache.zip and on here failed to load/download mindscape cache… might wanna go back n fix all this.
